member.name: T:Muon.DotNetExtensions.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: This namespace contains extension methods for Microsoft .NET classes.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemReflectionAssemblyExt.GetCompany(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Gets the Company attribute of an assembly.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemReflectionAssemblyExt.GetCopyright(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Gets the Copyright attribute of an assembly.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemReflectionAssemblyExt.GetDescription(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Gets the Description attribute of an assembly.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemReflectionAssemblyExt.GetProduct(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Gets the Product attribute of an assembly.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemReflectionAssemblyExt.GetTitle(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Gets the Title attribute of an assembly.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemReflectionAssemblyExt.GetVersion(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the Version attribute of an assembly.
member.param: The number of version parts to get (1-4). The default is 4.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemStringExt.Unescape(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the unescaped version of a string. See for the supported escape sequences.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemStringExt.Truncate(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a new string that contains at most the specified number of characters of the current instance.
member.param: The maximum number of characters to return.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemWindowsDependencyObjectExt.GetTreeHasError(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Determines if any DependenctObject node in a DependencyObject tree has an error.
member.param: The root node of the DependencyObject tree.
member.returns: True if the DependencyObject tree has an error.

member.name: M:Muon.DotNetExtensions.SystemWindowsDependencyObjectExt.GetTreeHasError(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines if any DependenctObject node in a DependencyObject tree has an error.
member.param: The root node of the DependencyObject tree.
If true do not evaluate nodes that are disabled.
If true do not evaluate nodes that are invisible.
member.returns: True if the DependencyObject tree has an error.
